typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	parameter1 as string
}
source(output(
		{Src_OETireSize } as string,
		Src_LoadRange as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcOEForecastLoadRange
source(output(
		OETireSize as string,
		LoadRange as string,
		Updated_Date as timestamp,
		Inserted_Date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RefDimOEFORECASTLOADRANGE
SrcOEForecastLoadRange, RefDimOEFORECASTLOADRANGE join({Src_OETireSize } == OETireSize,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOEtireSize
JoinOEtireSize split(not(isNull({Src_OETireSize }))&&(isNull(OETireSize)),
	not(isNull({Src_OETireSize }))&&not(isNull(OETireSize))&&ltrim(rtrim(trim({Src_OETireSize })))==ltrim(rtrim(trim(OETireSize))),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ConSplitIns, other, ConSplitupd)
ConditionalSplit1@ConSplitIns derive(INS_TS = currentTimestamp(),
		UPD_TS = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00')) ~> DerColINS
AlterRowUpd derive(Inserted_Date = currentTimestamp(),
		Updated_Date = '9999-12-31 00:00:00') ~> DerColUpd
ConditionalSplit1@ConSplitupd alterRow(updateIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRowUpd
DerColUpd sink(input(
		OETireSize as string,
		LoadRange as string,
		Updated_Date as timestamp,
		Inserted_Date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['set identity_insert  OE_Forecast_Loadrange on'],
	postSQLs:['set identity_insert  OE_Forecast_Loadrange off'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SnkDimOEFORECASTLOADRANGEUpd
DerColINS sink(input(
		OETireSize as string,
		LoadRange as string,
		Updated_Date as timestamp,
		Inserted_Date as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Src_OETireSize '],
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['set identity_insert OE_Forecast_Loadrange on'],
	postSQLs:['set identity_insert OE_Forecast_Loadrange off'],
	mapColumn(
		OETireSize = {Src_OETireSize },
		LoadRange = Src_LoadRange,
		Updated_Date = UPD_TS,
		Inserted_Date = INS_TS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SnkDimOEFORECASTLOADRANGEINS
